skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: abba's promises
des:
For as many as are the promises of God, in Christ they are [all answered] “Yes.” So through Him we say our “Amen” to the glory of God. 2 Corinthians 1:20
This skill helps intensify your focus on categorized promises of God in the Bible such as Wellbeing, Health & Healing, Provision, Protection and many more.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
